original_text: Behold, about this time tomorrow I will cause very heavy hail to fall, such as never has been in Egypt from the day it was founded until now.
korean_text: 내일 이맘때면 내가 무거운 우박을 내리리니 애굽 나라가 세워진 그 날로부터 지금까지 그와 같은 일이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: I will cause very heavy hail to fall,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 매우 무거운 우박을 내리게 하리니

sentences.original_text: such as never has been in Egypt
from the day it was founded until now.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅이 세워진 날부터 지금까지의 것이라.
